Package theDeathNotice

Class CardDeck

java.lang.Object
theDeathNotice.CardDeck
public class CardDeck
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the card deck in the game. The card deck has 4-8 death cards and one Joker on top of a standard deck of cards (with the exception of As as death cards are As).
Version:
1
Author:
Skyla

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    CardDeck​(Game game)
    Creates a CardDeck (a standard card deck, except with 4-8 As and 1 Joker).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Card drawTopCard()
    Removes the card at the top of the deck.
    int getDeathDistance()
    Counts the number of steps or cards there are until the next DeathCard.
    int getNumOfCards()
    The number of cards left in the deck that have not been drawn yet.
    boolean isTopCardVisible()
    If the card at the top of the deck is visible to all players (the front is showing) or not.
    Card peekTopCard()
    Looks at the card at the top of the deck.
    void setTopCardVisible​(boolean topCardVisible)
    Sets the card at the top of the deck visible to all players (flips the card).
    void shuffleDeck()
    Shuffles the deck by putting the cards in the deck in a random order.
    java.lang.String toString()  

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • CardDeck

      public CardDeck​(Game game)
      Creates a CardDeck (a standard card deck, except with 4-8 As and 1 Joker).
      Parameters:
      game - the game the card deck is used for

  • Method Details

    • drawTopCard

      public Card drawTopCard()
      Removes the card at the top of the deck.
      Returns:
      the card removed or null if there are no more cards to draw

    • peekTopCard

      public Card peekTopCard()
      Looks at the card at the top of the deck.
      Returns:
      the top card in the deck or null if there are no more cards in deck

    • isTopCardVisible

      public boolean isTopCardVisible()
      If the card at the top of the deck is visible to all players (the front is showing) or not.
      Returns:
      true if the top card is visible, false otherwise

    • setTopCardVisible

      public void setTopCardVisible​(boolean topCardVisible)
      Sets the card at the top of the deck visible to all players (flips the card).
      Parameters:
      topCardVisible - whether or not the top card is visible

    • getNumOfCards

      public int getNumOfCards()
      The number of cards left in the deck that have not been drawn yet.
      Returns:
      The number of cards left in the deck.

    • getDeathDistance

      public int getDeathDistance()
      Counts the number of steps or cards there are until the next DeathCard.
      Returns:
      the number of cards until the next DeathCard

    • shuffleDeck

      public void shuffleDeck()
      Shuffles the deck by putting the cards in the deck in a random order.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
